valueString: Using this patient's age, gender, and serum creatinine value of 1.2,.  Estimated GFR = 58 if non African-American (mL/min/1.73 m2).  Estimated GFR = 70 if African-American (mL/min/1.73 m2).  For comparison, mean GFR for age group 70+ is 75 (mL/min/1.73 m2).  GFR<60 = Chronic Kidney Disease, GFR<15 = Kidney Failure.
